skins.selfIntroduction: Name's Fiji, I'm pretty much the nameship of my class. Things I fancy include... What? Spare the details? Then, if you're asking about my service record, all I did was fight in the Battle of Crete. Pretty rubbish record, innit... ahaha. Just gonna have to live with it and work on it, you know?
skins.acquisition: Heeey! Fiji's here~! Are you the Commander? Hmmm...? Pfft... Hahaha! You don't look too shabby! Nice seeing you, Com~man~der~?
skins.login: Had supper yet, Commander? If not, I could cook you something up.
skins.details: What's up, Commander? Missed me, have you? Hah, alright, have a seat and I'll get you some tea.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Jamaica? Ah, yeah, proper oddball, that girl~ But it's all good as long as she's having fun, innit?
skins.secretaryIdle2: What's up? You look knackered... Fancy a nap in my lap, maybe?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Hey, take a gander at this, Commander! Fancy what I've done with my hair? How about my nails?
skins.secretaryTouch: Feeling lonely, Commander? I'm always here for you.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: If you wanna know my three sizes, can't you just ask? I mean, if you do, I'll tell you~ Hahaha~?

skins.shipDescription: Did I keep you waiting, Commander? Ahaha... A girl's gotta take her time before stepping out onto the streets, remember? Come on, take my hand, and let's get going! Hehe~
skins.acquisition: Did I keep you waiting, Commander? Ahaha... A girl's gotta take her time before stepping out onto the streets, remember? Come on, take my hand, and let's get going! Hehe~
skins.login: Commander, we've talked about the importance of being punctual before, right...? As compensation for making me wait, we're gonna shop 'til we drop! Ahaha!
skins.details: Hehe, what do you think about my outfit, Commander? Pretty nice, isn't it? ...You don't know where you should be looking? Haha, you cheeky little...
skins.secretaryIdle1: The joy of going shopping is knowing that every time you go out, there's something new to be discovered. Commander, I'll let you handle the "spoils" of our shopping trip.
skins.secretaryIdle2: You've gotta try on some new clothes during your downtime every now and then! Hehe, want me to help you pick out some clothes, Commander?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Girls need to do a lot of preparation before going out, you know? Hair, makeup, clothes, you name it... So, if you want to see us at our cutest, you've got to be patient~
skins.secretaryTouch: When we're on a date, it's only natural to lock arms and lean against you like this~ Ahaha, are you embarrassed, Commander?
